EmailTemplate.description: This template is used for web-to-case responses
EmailTemplate.name: New Case Response (Web-to-Case)
EmailTemplate.subject: ISYS Referral # {!Case.ISYS_File__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
Your referral has successfully been submitted for {!Case.Claimant__c}.
To further confirm our receipt of this referral, you will receive an email or fax confirmation of the Case Manager assigned to your file. If you do not receive a confirmation within 24 hours (weekends and holidays excluded) please call our corporate office at (800) 992-8100.
We appreciate your confidence in our staff of experienced professionals who are committed to provide you with high quality and timely services to assist in meeting your claims management needs.
Sincerely,
Your Customer Relations Representative
